meanings.definition: The act of processing something jointly with another entity.
meanings.sent1: The coprocessing of data between two computers was efficient.
meanings.sent2: Our coprocessing of the project with the other team went smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The coprocessing of snacks at the party made everyone happy.
meanings.sent4: Their coprocessing of ideas led to a brilliant solution.
meanings.sent5: The coprocessing of ingredients in the recipe created a delicious dish.

meanings.definition: The process of using two or more processors to perform a task.
meanings.sent1: Coprocessing in the factory increased productivity.
meanings.sent2: The coprocessing of information required teamwork.
meanings.sent3: The coprocessing of chores made the work fun.
meanings.sent4: Their coprocessing of skills made them unbeatable.
meanings.sent5: The coprocessing of tools made the job faster.
